page.title: 01INTRODUCTION HUDDERSFIELD
page.content: {Our block runs just north of the town {centre and has every type of {housing,industry and peoples {imaginable. In a belt across the {southern edge is the valley which {contains a lot of heavy industry. In {the middle is a band of older back to {back and terraced housing. The N.E. {has Huddersfield's largest council {estate, the N.W. has some of the most {expensive housing in the town. {Amongst all this are areas of open {moorland, woodland and a large Golf {Course. {The area is proud of it's wide social {and ethnic mix, we only have to walk {through the area to see people from {many different countries. India, {Pakistan, Italy, West Indies, many {East Europeans and Chinese.
